DOC.brief_title: A Open Label Study Efficacy Safety PD0332991 Selective Inhibitor Cyclin Dependent Kinases 4 6 Patients With Recurrent Ovarian Cancer Demonstrating Rb-proficiency Low p16 Expression

Adequate coagulation parameter ( within 21 day prior registration ) , International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) ≤1.5 ; Activated ProThrombin Time ( APTT ) ≤ 1.5 x ULN . 11 . Any follow within 6 month prior trial registration : myocardial infarction , severe/unstable angina pectoris , coronary/peripheral artery bypass graft , NYHA class III IV congestive heart failure , cerebrovascular accident transient ischemic attack , pulmonary embolism , deep vein thrombosis , thromboembolic event .
